name: KONIK Quest
description:
You are a student at Warsaw University of Technology. During your last semester you failed a couple of courses. No big deal, right? Then why is the university's dean himself calling you? Maybe it has something to do with disappearing students? Maybe there is a way that you could both help each other and solve the mystery?

Move with WASD and interact with LMB.

Slavic Game Jam Submission.

The project is unfinished for now, but we're doing our best to complete it as soon as possible!
